OOC: He's only going to appear in the vision.

         ::Still in the Past just kinding back to the (Present)::

::Koj::

In the Cr Chamber is unaware that his weapons are coming online the blade 
sticking out of his forehead starts to gather enegry as it fires a medium 
power blast within the chamber destorying it. As the feeling of Blood Lust 
sets in the the Fang resounds.

::Inu-Yasha::

Inu hears the nosie looks alittle scared and finally open his mouth "Damn 
the Cr chamber unsealed he locked data tracks." Inu tries to get on the 
Intercom "If Koj is spotted do not incounter repeat do not incounter"

::Koj::

Koj eyes open the white color is devoured by a blood red. Koj focuses 
"SOUNDWAVE!!!" and takes off flying at extremly high speeds within the base 
and ripping the doors that lead to the Cr room of the hinges races towards 
the exit looking for the nearest pred power source.
